torch.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small electric lamp that you carry in your hand
torch.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We shone our torches around the cavern.
torch.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a long stick with burning material at one end that produces light
torch.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to deliberately make a building, vehicle etc start to burn
